data.title: Where is the Thunderbird Adaptive Junk Mail Log located?
data.meta_description:

data.text:
I have located how to display the Thunderbird Adaptive Junk Mail Log but there is NO Search option available to look through the hundreds of filtered messages for the ones I am concerned about.

I would like to get at the log itself so that I can do searchs.

I am running Thunderbird on Linux and would like to know where that log file is stored.

thanks! --brock
